TextBlock.Text: SOLANUM: I leave this message seeking help with a matter!
SOLANUM: I took one of the scrolls from within the tower, hoping to learn more about the <color=orange>Looming City's</color> history.. But it slipped from my grasp as I fell into the pool!
SOLANUM: I dove in to retrieve it, but a tentacled species dwelling within the pool appears to be fiercely guarding it!
SOLANUM: Its long, electrifying appendages have entirely surrounded the scroll, and there appears to be no way to slip under its vigilance.
SOLANUM: I feel deeply ashamed leaving this scroll until I complete my pilgrimage - but I have already received a few shocks trying to retrieve it..

5 SOLANUM: If anyone who finds this message is able to beseech the lifeform to budge: I would be most grateful if you would kindly retrieve the scroll in my stead!z
